cleaned_text: of 3: Sleep, Stress, Balance - All-Natural Rollerball Set of 3- Sleep, Stress, Balance blends - 100% pure derivatives from plant sources, non-GMO natural essential oil without any chemicals additives - How to Use - External use only. Infused with natural carrier oils, apply directly to the skin without dilution. Suitable for wrist, chest, temples, palms, and soles of feet, behind ears. Small size and easy to carry - Best Choice for Gift - This blend set is suitable as a gift for health-conscious people on different occasions. Premium present for Valentines Day, Mothers Day, Fathers Day, Holiday, Housewarming, Christmas or Birthday Availability: 2 in stock
